inclusion.criterion: Children with MAM defined as mid-upper-arm circumference, MUAC, ≤ 12.5 cm and > 11.5
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children simultaneously involved in another research trial or supplemental feeding program
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with a chronic debilitating illness such as cerebral palsy (not including HIV or TB)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with a history of peanut or milk allergy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children will also be excluded if they had received therapy for acute malnutrition within one month prior to presentation.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
